name: [LD32] Legend of the Yoyo Salesman
description:
This was an entry for Ludum Dare 32 compo, which took place in 2015. The theme of the contest was unconventional weapons.

Developed using Haxe Flixel (https://haxeflixel.com/)

The game was developed as a solo effort (compo). All music, art, and coding was done within a 48 hour window.

Archived original submission post for LD:

https://ludumdata.openfu.com/game/10746
